      • applyToRectangle

        public abstract void applyToRectangle(int x1,
                                      int x2,
                                      int y1,
                                      int y2)
        Apply filter to a rectangular area.
        Parameters:
        x1 - x coordinate of the top left point of the rectangular area.
        x2 - x coordinate of the bot right point of the rectangular area.
        y1 - y coordinate of the top left point of the rectangular area.
        y2 - y coordinate of the bot right point of the rectangular area.

      • applyToCircle

        public abstract void applyToCircle(int x,
                                   int y,
                                   int r)
        Apply filter to a circled area.
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the center of the circle.
        y - y coordinate of the center of the circle.
        r - radius of the circle.

        img - the BufferedImage to load with this filter.
